entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
